body:
- Add support for View
- Add `fetch_view_names` method `SimpleSQLite` class
- Add `has_view` method `SimpleSQLite` class
- Update requirements

- Add `type_hints` argument to `create_table_from_data_matrix` method
- Remove `setuptools` requires
- Add support for Python 3.10
- Drop support for Python 3.5
- Fix `fetch_attr_names` method improperly return attributes when passing a database that has MySQL (or other databases) schema descriptions: #72 (Thanks to @bobgott)

- Fix changes in `max_workers` value are properly applied
- Update requirements
- Accept table names that start with numbers

- Fix `create_table_from_dataframe`: #67 (Thanks to @b0b5h4rp13)
- Add support for `datetime` value conversion
- Update requirements
- Modify type annotations
- Modify to extract type_hints from `pandas.DataFrame` for `create_table_from_dataframe`
- Fix to include `py.typed` to the package

- Drop Python 2 support
- Add type annotations and `py.typed` to the package
- Update requirements
- Minor bug fixes

- Add `as_dict` method to `Model` class
- Make it possible to assign attribute name to columns of `Model`
- Remove deprecated methods

- Add support for platforms that lacks support `sem_open` such as Android Termux
- Add interfaces to set the maximum number of workers to convert a table
- Add support for Python 3.9
- Replace logging library from `Logbook` to `loguru`
- Remove `dev` extras_require

- Add support for PyPy
- Integrate `build`/`release`/`docs` extras to `dev` extras
- Add `.asc` files of packages to PyPI
- Update requirements
- Bug fixes
- Add an interface to set primary key to `create_table_from_xxx` methods : #63 (Thanks to @xuanblo)
- Add simple object-relational mapping (ORM) feature

- Add a method to execute a delete query
- Add a method to set row_factory
- Add log messages
- Avoid deleting SQLite internal table
- Performance improvement
- Fix package dependency: #62 (Thanks to @fschim)

- Performance improvement
- Loosen package dependency

- Improve performance for multi-core environments
- Drop support for Python 3.3

- Allow apostrophe characters in a query
- Bug fixes
- Add `select_as_tabledata` and `select_as_dataframe` methods to `SimpleSQLite` class

- Refactor loader interfaces
- Bug fixes
- Fix the problem of table name conflicts to SQLite reserved keywords for automatic table name creation by using table loaders
- Fix excessive table counting

- Add feature to create table from HTML
- Bug fixes
- Modify error handling when opening a spreadsheet
- Bug fixes
- Refactoring
- Improve memory efficiency for Python 2
- Replace functions that no longer supported
- Drop support for Python 2.6
- Fix conversion error when data include a version string (such as "3.3.5")

- Add get_num_records method
- Add get_attr_type method
- Modify to santize quote/double-quote in attribute name
- Fix for a case that have a single-quote/double-quote in a table header
- Make pytest-runner a conditional requirement
- Fix: query that `make_where` method created was invalid when an right-hand is `None`

# Enhancement
- Add support for creating tables from CSV text in addition to a CSV file
- Add support for creating tables from JSON/Excel/Google-Sheets
- Fix connection to an in-memory database

- Replace TableConfiguration class with get_sqlite_master method
- Change return value of the get_profile method from tuple to namedtuple to improve ease of use.
- Drop python 2.5 support

# Enhancement
- Add create_table_from_csv method

# Modification
- Merge copy_table and append_table functions to append_table
- Add verification of table existence when executing query.
